definitions.text:
Holyday
 set apart for commemorating some important event in history; festival intended to celebrate some event deemed auspicious to the welfare of nation; particularly an anniversary festival, devoted to religious solemnities; as christmas holydays.
1. of joy and gayety.
2. of exemption from labor; of amusement.HOL'YDAY,
Pertaining to festival; as holyday suit of clothes.
